title: mac air  820-00165 board no back light
message:
customer tried to change lcd now back light blown, 

fuse good, 
PPVIN_S0SW_LCDBKLT_FET=0v

i see EDP_BKLT_EN=0
         BKLT_PLT_RST_L=3.3v 

why  EDP_BKLT_EN=0v?



led drive bad? if led led driver bad there should be still 8.6v to L7701?


what to do what to do

title: mac air  820-00165 board no back light
message:
Do you get image without backlight?
Any voltage at DP_INT_HPD?
